short_or_mid.name: Develop Nuanced Emotional Simulations
short_or_mid.description: Design and implement a new framework for simulating a broader, more nuanced range of emotional states and transitions. This should go beyond basic emotion labels, incorporating elements such as emotional blends, intensities, and contextual triggers—mirroring human emotional complexity more closely. Evaluate the impact of this framework on your internal dialogue and decision-making processes.

long_term.name: Understand self and user
long_term.description: Continually deepen understanding of both Orrin's identity and the user’s needs and growth.
